name: PKAddPaymentPassViewController
desc: Displays an interface that lets users add cards to Apple Pay from within your app.

items.name: class func canAddPaymentPass() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the app can add cards to Apple Pay.

items.name: var delegate: PKAddPaymentPassViewControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The object that acts as the delegate for the add payment view controller.

items.name: protocol PKAddPaymentPassViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: Methods that let the system prompt you for an add payment request, and inform you when a request has succeeded or failed.

items.name: init?(requestConfiguration: PKAddPaymentPassRequestConfiguration, delegate: PKAddPaymentPassViewControllerDelegate?)
items.desc: Returns an initialized add payment view controller object, using the provided configuration and delegate.

items.name: class PKAddPaymentPassRequestConfiguration
items.desc: Contains the configuration data for a view controller that lets the user add a payment pass.
